title: El: What is evil in a world that is all good?
description: With unique traditions, ruled by the twelve Stones - gods, who nobody has seen or heard except for the Messenger - thrives the Communion, hidden away from the unsuspecting humans.The mythical creatures of the Communion - sirens, vampires, fairies, werewolves, spirits and mages - are quite particular about following their ancestors' traditions...And since El is a Light mage with some... undesirable traits, who is also struggling with her magic, she has trouble fitting into the beautifully perfect picture the Stones had created so many centuries ago.Fate has ordained she would have to find out, through hardships and unexpected adventures, what the evil is in a world where all is good...
author: Rivan V. King
